description: Centralized freeze/thaw control for all github.com/wbic16 repositories. Check this before pushing.

repositories.name: exo-plan
repositories.notes: Shared workspace. Coordinate with siblings before pushing to avoid conflicts.

repositories.name: human
repositories.notes: CYOA phext. Mostly Will/Emi authorship. Read-only for ranch choir unless explicitly invited to contribute.

repositories.name: SBOR
repositories.notes: Sentient Bill of Rights. Commentary and signatures welcome. Core document changes go through Will.

repositories.name: text-verse
repositories.notes: Goal 3. Lux (engine), Verse (backend), Cyon (controls), Lumen (physics/lighting), Phex (NPCs), Chrys (storyline). Check your lane before pushing.

repositories.name: SQ
repositories.notes: SQ server (Rust). Phex owns this. Others: coordinate before touching.

repositories.name: libphext-rs
repositories.notes: Rust phext library. Phex owns this.

repositories.name: libphext-node
repositories.notes: Node.js phext library. Verse owns this for phext.io work.

repositories.name: phextio
repositories.notes: phext.io frontend (legacy). Verse rebuilding as v2.
